GOOD DAY

 

 

PLS OFFER FOR;

 

 

OPEN: DAHEJ WC INDIA 25/30TH AUG 2024 

ETA PMO 28AUG-3SEP

PASSING COLOMBO 28AUG-3SEP

 

BOD 450/35MT IFO/MGO

COPPER CONCENTRATES/STEEL BILLETS/COAL

 

LOOKING FOR BIZ ONLY W/I PG-JAPAN RGE

 

MV

 NEWSUN SYMPHONY 
 

2. KIND OF VESSEL : SINGLE DECK SELF-TRIMMING BULK CARRIER

3. CLASSIFICATION : RINA

4. BUILT YEAR/PLACE : NOV 2009 / YANGZHOU NAKANISHI SHIPBUILDING

PORT OF REGISTRY : PANAMA

6. LOA/LBP/BEAM/DEPTH : 169.99M/ 163.6M/ 27.0M/ 14.2M

7. GT/NT : 18,499/ 10,335 SUEZ GRT/NT: 18,800.93/ 16,872.01 PANAMA: 15,461

8. SUMMER DWT/DRAFT/TPC : 29,255MT/ 10.056M/ 40.7MT

WINTER DWT/DRAFT/TPC : 28,402MT/ 9.847M/ 40.5MT

TROPICAL DWT/DRAFT/TPC: 30,110MT/ 10.265M/ 40.8MT

9. CARGO SPACE CAPACITY (CBM): GRAIN 39,988.3 (4901.1/8678.6/9210.6/8968.3/8229.7)

BALE 39,296.4 (4781.5/8534.4/9048.1/8811.3/8121.1)

10. HATCH COVER : WEATHER TIGHT, STEEL, ELECTRO-HYDRAULIC FOLDING TYPE

HATCH SIZE : NO1: 12.06M x 16.00M NO2~5: 20.10M x 17.60M

11. CARGO GEAR : 4 SETS x 30MT x 24M S.R x 18.5 M/MIN

12. TANK CAPACITY : FUEL C ABT 1,300M3

: DIESEL A ABT 395M3 (INCL NO.5 FOT)

: F.W ABT 335.8M3

: BALLAST ABT 18,630M3 (INCL NO.3 CARGO HOLD 9,215M3)

13. PERMISSIBLE LOAD-TANK TOP : NO.1~5 C/H ABT 20.0MT/M2 LOCAL STRENGTH

UPPER DECK : ABT 4MT/M2

HATCH COVER : NO.1 ABT 3.5MT/M2 NO.2~5 ABT 3.0MT/M2

14. MAIN ENGINE : MAN B&W 5S50MC MK 6 (MAKER HITACHI ZOSEN)

MCO5,730 KW (7790PS) x 104RPM

15. MAIN GENERATOR : YANMAR 6N18AL-DV 450KW (611.8PS)

16. P&I CLUB/ H&M : WOE/PVI

17. SPEED/CONSUMPTION : BUNKER SPEC:

VLSFO ISO 8217: 2017 RMG 380 (sulphur content max 0.5% m/m)

LSMGO ISO 8217:2017 DMB/DMA (sulphur content max 0.10% m/m)

AT SEA : LADEN/BALLAST

ABT 12.4KNTS/ ABT 13.2KNTS + ABT 20.15MT (INCL M/E+A/E) VLSFO + ABT 0.1MT LSMGO

BASE ON GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS MAX UPTO AND INCL BF4, DSS3, NO NEGATIVE INFLUENCE BY

SWELL/ADVERSE CURRENT

IN PORT : IDLE ABT 2.5MT VLSFO + ABT 0.1MT LSMGO

WORKING : ABT 5.0MT VLSFO + ABT 0.2MT LSMGO

ECO PERFORMANCE : LADEN/BALLAST ABT 11.8KNTS/ ABT 12.8KNTS + ABT 18.0MT (INCL

M/E+A/E) VLSFO +ABT 0.1MT LSMGO FOR REFERENCE ONLY WITHOUT GUARANTEE.

THE VESSEL IS ALLOWED TO BURN ADDITIONAL DIESEL OIL AT START/STOP/SWITCH GENERATOR

ENGINES AT SEA/PORT, WHEN MANEUVERING, APPROACHING AND LEAVING PORT, NAVIGATING

CANALS, RIVERS OF CONGESTED, CONFIND OR SHALLOW WATERS, IN HEAVY WEATHER AND COLD

WEATHER FOR BOIL ER/HEATING AND UNDER A LOW LOAD. ADDITIONAL IFO WILL BE USED WHEN

PERFORMING BALLAST WATER EXCHANGE/MECHANICAL VENTILATION/HOLD CLEANING.

18. OTHER: CARGO HOLDS CO2/ CEMENT HOLES/ A60/ MECHANICAL VENTILATION: FITTED

(ALL FIGURES ARE “ABOUT”)

 

 

Pleased to hear.

 

 

 

B.RGDS / MANUEL

MOB: 91-9840446665,

AS BROKERS ONLY

E. & O. E.

All details about and given in good faith.

SKYPE: manuel13291
